channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Clock is ticking: TikTok could go dark in U.S. on Jan. 19 as federal court upholds ban
item.description: A federal appeals court in Washington on Friday upheld a law banning TikTok in the U.S. unless it's sold by Jan. 19.

item.title: Reining In Federal Spending Must Start With The Executive Branch
item.description: For years going on decades, presidents of both parties have used executive action to spend money Congress never fully authorized.

item.title: People Who Fought In Afghanistan Know Why Nation-Building Was Never Going To Work
item.description: In Afghanistan, tribalism is at a virtually unparalleled level. Westerners have no idea how deeply disturbing that tribalism can be.

item.title: States Should Stop Subsidizing Union Politicking

item.title: Trump appoints former Sen. David Perdue to be ambassador to China
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump on Thursday announced that he picked former Sen. David Perdue to serve as U.S. ambassador to China.

item.title: Top law enforcement official sounds alarm about bloodthirsty Venezuelan gang operating in red state
item.description: The Tennessee Bureau of Investigation Director David Rausch is warning about the presence of violent Venezuelan gang Tren de Aragua in the state.

item.title: How the Yale Women’s Center Was Colonized by Pro-Hamas Radicalism

item.title: Gail Slater Is The Perfect Pick To Lead The Trump DOJ’s Fight Against Big Tech
item.description: Everyone across the political spectrum — except, of course, tech giants and their paid shills in D.C. — should welcome the nomination of Gail Slater.
